wikipedia_page.main: Bryan Todd (5 April 1938 – 9 June 2018) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s. He played at representative level for Yorkshire, and at club level for York, Halifax, Keighley (two spells), St. Helens, and Bradford Northern (two spells), as a centre.
